summary:
This mod adds to the game Breton - bard named Aien, who can be your companion just for the love of art. Performs 25 songs and 7 guitar tracks, only sings his own songs. Aien is very curious and loves to gossip with other characters.
Text and voice in Russian.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Version[/b]: 1.4 
[b]Language[/b]: [u]Russian[/u] 

[b]Description: [/b]This mod adds to the game Breton - bard named Aien, who can be your companion just for the love of art. 
[b]Read more:[/b] - Bard, a good command of two swords and onions (perks - pockets, silence, etc.) - Clothing and his partner is available in the inventory, so you can take it off and wear what you want, after the dismissal is that given - Performed 25 songs and 7 guitar tracks. - He likes to give concerts in the taverns, through dialogue, you can ask her to stop speech (choose - "Sing to me", then select the dialogue). - If you fire her, then she should perform his songs (in taverns - verified) - Sometimes love to gossip with the other characters. In the tavern book your own food, feeds the poor, etc. - Dialogues not so much as I, but it is quite - Join her in marriage - you can! 
[b]Locations:[/b] - Habitat Riverwood, look at the tavern 
[b]Important: [/b]If you can not get rid of the invisible companion type in the console - [u]set playerfollowercount to 0 [/u]and press Enter 
[b]optional: [/b]In the folder is optional esp. file - patch for compatibility with UFO (set as needed)hairstyle - Saskia from the witch, put - on request 
[b]requirements: [/b]Game Version 1.9.32.0.8 and up 
[b]Recommended mode (optional):
 [/b]My Home Is Your Home 
 Lively Followers[/center][center][youtube]h7mCFUg4DKs[/youtube][/center]
[center]I'm sorry for my english .....[/center]
author: veter75n
